weka.dl4j.interpretability

Class AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.interpretability.AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WekaScoreCAM

    public abstract class AbstractCNNSaliencyMapWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler
    WEKA Wrapper for a Saliency Map Generator (e.g., ScoreCAM). Provides the WEKA handles and getters/setters to control the generator from the command line/GUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • processImage

        public abstract void processImage(java.io.File imageFile)
        Main processing entrypoint. Takes an image as input, and performs the necessary processing on it. Note that this is performed separately to the actual saliency map generation. This method should only perform the expensive one-time processing on an image.
        Parameters:
        imageFile - Image to process heatmap for.

      • generateHeatmapToImage

        Human-viewable heatmap summary.

      • getTargetClassIDs

        @OptionMetadata(displayName="Target Classes",
                description="Output class to generate saliency maps for; default is -1 (use the highest probability class). This only needs to be set if wanting to use a non-default class from the *command line*; if using the *GUI*, the \'View Saliency Map\' window contains the interface for setting this.",
                commandLineParamName="target-classes",
                commandLineParamSynopsis="-target-classes <int,int,...>",
                displayOrder=2)
 @ProgrammaticProperty
public java.lang.String getTargetClassIDs()
